title: Waymo to Test Vehicles With Human Drivers at Newark Airport
description: Alphabet Inc.’s Waymo will begin manually testing its autonomous vehicles with human drivers at Newark airport, laying the foundation to eventually ferry passengers to and from the transit hub.

title: Warner Bros. to Begin Sharing Financial Data With Bidders
description: Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. expects to begin asking would-be bidders for the film and TV giant to sign nondisclosure agreements as early this week, according to a person familiar with its plans.

title: DeepSeek’s Surge in Africa Reveals China’s AI Power Grab
description: By making AI cheaper and less power-hungry, DeepSeek has put the technology within reach of millions of people.
